definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
to hunt for novelty/to seek novelty
to skim (through a book)/to read cursorily/to dip into

sentences.english: In the story, the cunning fox outsmarts the hunters.
sentences.chinese: 在这个故事中，狡猾的狐狸智取了猎人们。

sentences.english: Let us go fox-hunting with Beth.
sentences.chinese: 我们和贝思一起去猎狐狸吧。

sentences.english: The park had fine trees, and there were deer roaming among them.
sentences.chinese: 猎苑里树木优良，鹿漫游于树间。

sentences.english: P1ease don't tell me the story. I want to see it myself.
sentences.chinese: 请不要告诉我故事猎箝害我想自看看。

sentences.english: Finally those who hunt them must be punished severely.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对涌锒猎珍稀野生动物的人必须严惩。

sentences.english: An arch of the bridge in the park has been sapped and sopped away.
sentences.chinese: 猎园里的那座桥有一个桥洞被水冲毁，而且被冲走了。

sentences.english: The Norwegian Elkhound is a square and athletic member of the northern dog family.
sentences.chinese: 挪威猎麋鹿犬是一种正方形比例，运动型的北方狗。

sentences.english: Soon after the hunters came to the stable, and asked if anyone had seen the hart.
sentences.chinese: 猎人们很快来到牛栏，询问是否有人看到这头鹿。

sentences.english: This was after a white bear with patches of brown fur was shot by hunters.
sentences.chinese: 当时猎人们射杀了一只长着棕色斑块皮毛白熊。

sentences.english: The hunters took a fox by a trap.
sentences.chinese: 猎人们设陷阱捉住一只狐狸。

sentences.english: The hedge shook as he tangled with the hound.
sentences.chinese: 它和猎浣熊犬撕扯时，树篱晃个不停。

sentences.english: If the hunters were there, Huineng cried and begged them to release the animals.
sentences.chinese: 如果猎人们在场，慧能就哭着求他们把动物放走。

sentences.english: I have never gone hunting in my life!
sentences.chinese: 我一生中从来没有去狩过猎。

sentences.english: Remember that grief is a natural pridator, so learn to tolerate some damage.
sentences.chinese: 谨记，悲伤是天然的猎多者，因此要学会忍受损失。

sentences.english: I went hunting and killed me a a couple deer today, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 我今天去打猎猎，猎到了两头小鹿，你干什么了？

definition: to herd/to breed livestock/to govern (old)/government official (old)
aardwolf (Proteles cristatus), a small insectivorous relative of the hyena
to hunt/to go hunting (as winter sport in former times)/hunting dog/imperial tour
